page.title: 06Worle High Street
page.content: In Worle High Street there are many shops,including the newsagent,hardware store and the Chinese take away. The newsagent is called Martins and sells things like sweets,comics, newspapers,greeting cards,books, cigarettes and tobacco.There are two main supermarkets,Gateway and Liptons. They both have big car parks and are very well situated in the middle of Worle.There is a mini-market called Fairsave and a shoe shop called In-step which sells very fashionable shoes.There is a clothes shop called Revalation which also sells ear-rings, bangles,flip-flops and socks.There are a number of banks,building societies and estate agents.Worle High Street is a shopping centre and sells almost everything people need.Although Worle has these new facilities it still retains the old Worle feeling.
